text: Russell Valentine Gardner is an educationist in the city of Dehradun. He has been the principal of St. Thomas' College, Dehradun for over three decades. He was also the Anglo-Indian representative for the first legislative assembly for the state of Uttarakhand, from 2002 to 2007, and the third assembly from 2012 to 2016. ==References== Category:Uttarakhand MLAs 2002–2007 Category:Uttarakhand MLAs 2012–2017 Category:People from Firozabad district Category:21st-century Indian politicians Category:1946 births Category:Living people
title: R. V. Gardner
